lenders.loan_because: The world has been generous to me and I want to share some of my good fortune.

lenders.name: Peter
lenders.loan_because: I have wasted more money on useless things in the past month than the small loans I've made on Kiva.  Even if all of my loans are not repaid, knowing that even one made a difference makes the risk worth it.

lenders.name: Sanja
lenders.loan_because: I have $200 to give.

lenders.name: Battlecat

lenders.name: Jessica

lenders.name: Raine Devries
lenders.loan_because:
I focus on loaning to those needing assistance with something "motorcycle" related.

My personal ride is a Harley-Davidson Dyna Low Rider (FXDL).  I've ridden her all around the U.S. and looking to ship her over to Europe for Harley's 110th Anniversary in 2013 and ride from Italy to the U.K. and visiting friends along the way.

Yes, my bike has a name:  Superstition.
lenders.occupational_info:
I like action and adventure in my life and shy away from cubicles and khakis.  I'm a Producer for projects in the Film / TV / Webcast world and highly enjoy my work.

I'm also a journalist for Examiner.com and write a national column on Harley-Davidson and (3) local columns for Dallas Downtown, Dallas Film Industry, and Dallas Motorcycle.

lenders.name: Tucker
lenders.loan_because: I believe that social and economic equity benefit all of us equally.

lenders.name: Tori

lenders.name: Rick

lenders.name: Vivien
lenders.loan_because: I want to give other people opportunities to make changes in their lives.

lenders.name: steve

it's the right thing to do.

lenders.loan_because: Its a small way that I can help.

lenders.occupational_info: I've always wanted to help people in need.  I think this is a great start.
